title.rendered: Amazon Basics USB Type-C to USB Type-C 2.0 Charger Cable – 6 Feet (1.8 Meters) – Black

content.rendered:
Size Name:1.8 Meters | Colour Name:Black | Pattern Name:Single

Amazon Basics gives on a regular basis objects on your dwelling, workplace, backyard and extra. With a range that continues to develop, the Amazon Basics model is about to turn out to be part of your day by day comfort for electronics merchandise and way of life.

Connect USB Type-C enabled gadgets (MacBook, (*6*) Pixel, Galaxy Note 7 and so forth.) with normal USB Type-C 2.0 enabled gadgets and equipment (smartphones, automotive/wall charger, multi-port adapters and so forth.)
Ideal for charging and powering USB Type-C enabled gadgets, in addition to syncing knowledge, pictures and music
Reversible design – simply insert the connector into any Type-C enabled gadget (doesn’t matter which aspect is up)
Type-C port is half the width and one-third the peak of a typical USB-A connector (barely bigger in contrast to Lightning or Micro-USB ports)
Up to 480 Mbps knowledge switch pace; energy output up to 5V, 3 Amp
Certified by USB-IF to be compliant with USB 2.0

excerpt.rendered:
Connect USB Type-C enabled devices (MacBook, Chromebook Pixel, Galaxy Note 7 etc.) with standard USB Type-C 2.0 enabled devices and accessories (smartphones, car/wall charger, multi-port adapters etc.)
Ideal for charging and powering USB Type-C enabled devices, as well as syncing data, photos and music
Reversible design – easily insert the connector into any Type-C enabled device (does not matter which side is up)
